div.head: A louing LOOKING GLASSE, sent to his friend, M. IOHN VICARS, in returne for his Heauenly PROSPECTIVE GLASSE.

lg.l: MY lookes can shew me Heauen through Thine,
My loue can shew thee, but his Hart, through Mine,
Loue, lookes, Heauen, and my Hart best part of friends,
Thy Glasse, Grace, Friendship and thy Zeale commends.
